titleStmt.title: Advice for the poor by way of cure & caution ... by T. Cocke.
titleStmt.author: Cock, Thomas.
Dixon, Roger, 17th cent. Directory for the poore against the plague and infectious diseases.

notesStmt.note: On p. [5]-[6] are orders for publication and distribution by the Duke of Albemarle, Lord Craven, and others.
Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
Includes: A directory for the poore against the plague and infectious diseases / Roger Dixon.
